title: Postdoc: Discovering the biophysical basis of CAR T cell function
job_description: As a postdoc in our Physics of Cellular Interactions group headed by Dr. Kristina Ganzinger, you will analyse the spatiotemporal dynamics of CAR T cell signalling both in live cells and by reconsti..
employer_description: AMOLF scientists are continuously searching for the fundamental relationship between the architecture and interactions of complex matter and material systems and their purpose and function.
